COMPETITOR ANALYSIS 1:
Title: Top 10 Nike Competitors in 2025
Content: Nike Competitor Crossword. Nike similar companies: lululemon athletica, VF Corporation, Under Armour, Adidas , Reebok, PUMA, Skechers, New Balance, FILA, ASICS and Anta. Nike obtains its income through the design, manufacture and sale of footwear, clothing and sports...
Source: https://whatcompetitors.com/nike/

COMPETITOR ANALYSIS 2:
Title: Adidas Gains Market Share from Nike , But Must Tread... - EconoTimes
Content: As Adidas capitalizes on the growing popularity of its Samba and Gazelle shoes, the brand is gaining market share from rival Nike . However, analysts caution that the trends longevity may wane, urging Adidas to manage its...
Source: https://econotimes.com/Adidas-Gains-Market-Share-from-Nike-But-Must-Tread-Carefully-with-Sambas-Popularity-1689879

COMPETITOR ANALYSIS 3:
Title: Nike Competitor Analysis - The Strategy Story
Content: Here is the competitor analysis of Nike . Conducting a competitor analysis for Nike involves examining the major sportswear and athletic gear market companies that offer similar products or services. Here’s how you might analyze Nike ’s key competitors
Source: https://thestrategystory.com/blog/nike-competitor-analysis/

COMPETITOR ANALYSIS 4:
Title: Top 20 Nike Competitors & Alternatives | Business Strategy Hub
Content: The top NIKE competitors and alternatives include Adidas , Puma, Reebok & many more.Even though New Balance still trails Nike with 43% of the market share and Adidas at 22%, its recent focus on the sector can help increase its share in 2021 and beyond. 3. Puma.
Source: https://bstrategyhub.com/top-nike-competitors-alternatives/
